meanings.definition: Having or showing high spirits; lively; cheerful.
meanings.sent1: She was the peppiest person at the party, always smiling and laughing.
meanings.sent2: The children at the playground were the peppiest in the neighborhood, running around and playing happily.
meanings.sent3: Even on a rainy day, her peppiest attitude brightened everyone's mood.
meanings.sent4: His peppiest personality was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The peppiest puppy in the litter wagged its tail non-stop, bringing joy to everyone around.
